issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Time-based types support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9107](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9107). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We lack the support of date/timestamp partitions, and predicate pushdown rules. Timestamp columns are usually the most important predicate in OLAP style queries, we need to support this transparently.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9107?focusedCommentId=17135990) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
While important, this is not a blocker

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9107?focusedCommentId=17171079) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7793
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7793>
